operator.title: Documents to Data
operator.synopsis: Generates a data set from documents.

text.paragraph: This operator generates a data set from a collection of documents. For each document in the collection, an example is added to the data set. The text contained in the document is stored in a nominal attribute. If a label or meta data are present associated with the documents, a label attribute or attribute for the meta data are created, respectively.

parameters.parameter: The name of the text attribute.
The name of the label attribute.
If checked, available meta information of the text like filename, date is added as attribute.
Determines, how the data is represented internally.
